lines.setup: The party's in full swing by the time Tasha joins it. 'Everyone is at least 3 drinks in,' she thinks. Tasha decides to catch up. After all, this is a party.
lines.anticipating_replicator_creation: looks suspiciously at the serving plate.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_succes: Now this Romunlan Ale is perfect
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: That's not what Romulan Ale tastes like!
